properties.name: Orang Mawas
properties.description: In Malaysian folklore, the Orang Mawas or Mawas (also known as the Orang Dalam) is an entity reported to inhabit the jungle of Johor in Malaysia. It is described as being about 10 ft (2.4â€“3 m) tall, bipedal and covered in black fur, and has been reported feeding on fish and raiding orchards.
